name: War Never Changes (BanishedRogue)
description:
Collect supplies to desert your own forces. The price you and those around you are paying can't possibly be worth the 'greater good' you're so often told about. Its time to leave. 

Seán O’Dálaigh-Pulford - Production Lead

Michael Dunne - Design Lead

Dylan Gleeson - Tech Lead

Emma Neeson - Art Lead

Ariadna Castellano - Musician
